choices: Gain assist. using pills which entrees your appetite.
Quick gain. Using methods that pack on the pounds very fast and very affectively
1.content:
Your an average sized boy at 125 lbs and 5'11". You have blond hair and green eyes and a flat stomach and a small six pack. You have always had a desire to be fat. When ever you see fat people on the street you think 'I want to be like that!' Every year you parents let you choose what summer camp you want to go to, so you were looking online when you found a camp call Fattening Camp! a camp for kids who want to be bigger! You found out that they offer something that tells your parents its a different camp so that they would send you there. When you get home, you run upstairs and into your room and shut the door. Your exited because you have camp tomorrow and you can't wait to start packing on the pounds. So you start packing.

The next day you wake up to the sound of your alarm which you set to ring at 9:00 am because the camp bus come to pick you up at 10:00 am. You hop out of bed and pull on some cloths. You run downstairs and find a note on the kitchen table, it reads "(IYNH) your father and I are sorry that we can't be there to see you off to the bus, I hope you have a wonderful summer. Love mom." You sigh and put the note in the trash, you go into the kitchen and grab some food from the pantry. Before you know it, it's 9:50, you grab your suitcase and leave the house and walk one block to were the bus is support to pick you up. At 10 the bus come and stops, you climb in and say "hello" to the bus driver, a man who looked about 40 or so. The man nodded but didn't say anything. You walk to the very back of the bus and find an empty seat next to a boy who looked to be about your age but a little chubbier. You sit down and say "Hi i'm (IYNH), whats yours?" "I'm Kyle" the boy says extending his hand, and you shake it. After about an hour the bus pulls into a parking lot. The doors open and you get out. And the end of the parking lot you see two signs, the first one reads, "First Timers" and the second one reads "Returners" you walk over to the sign that reads first timers. A small group of boys more or less around your age are also sanding around the sign. You wait about five seconds and then a young man comes and says "hello, my name is Robbert, I am the camp director. Please follow me to the mess hall." He starts to walk towards a large building and you follow him along with the other boys. Robbert leads you all though some glass doors into a very large room with rows of tables and very big chairs. You find a chair and sit down in it. You barley take up half of the chair. After about 10 minutes the entire hall is filled with lots of boys all around your age, all talking to one and other. You hear a voice through a loud speaker say "Hello, may I have your attention please?" at once the hall goes silent. "I am Robbert the camp director, and welcome to Fattening camp! I hope you have lots of fun here this summer! Before we get started I need to give everyone a few options about how they would like to gain. Of course you can always change at anytime. Here are the options.........
1.title: Schools out!

11.content: "Gaining assistance, using pills to enhance your appetite". That sounded great, so which to choose. I choose Italian food & ate ___ pills that with each one enhances the appetite by a number. It starts off at doubling with the first pill, then tripling with the second pill, & so forth. Only a maximum of ten pills could be taken at a time, & if so it requires at least six hours of recovery time. I ate & I ate like I've never eaten before, my belly expanding to the size of a basketball, beach ball, then watermelon & finally a pumpkin. How many pills did I eat & how much more would I gain, based on my appetite?..."
11.title: Gain assist. using pills which entrees your app...

111.content: Taking 3 pills, you decide it was enough. Suddenly you start to gain weight. Over the next few moments you gain 100 pounds and top off at 235 lbs. Knowing you couldn't do anything about that you just accept you are now over 200 lbs for the rest of your life.
111.title: 3 Pills (Triple Appetite)

112.content: Taking four pills. You realize you gain over 125 lbs. Topping out at 260 lbs you realize there is no going back and then you just accept the fact that you are really fat and there is nothing you can do about it. Life moves on without your ability to lose weight.
112.title: 4 Pills (Quadruple Appetite)

113.content: Taking 6 pills you realize that you gained 150 lbs. You topped out at 280 lbs. Realizing that is what you needed to be in weight. You just moved on with your life at 280 lbs with all livelihood.
113.title: 6 Pills (Six Times the Appetite)

114.content: Taking 8 pills you realize it was for the best. You add 200 lbs in weight. Being a fatty you realize you are really happy beyond being a person who is trying to be stay skinny. A fat woman is the best. for the rest of everyone's life.
114.title: 8 Pills (Eight Times the Appetite)

115.content: taking 10 pills u realize that you gained over 250 lbs. Pushing life over 300 lbs overall you realize life couldn't be better so you just decide to keep your weight over 350 lbs. It was the best thing you could have done for yourself.
115.title: 10 pills (Tenfold Appetite)

12.content: Over the 2.5 months of the summer you partacted in a lot of eating, and gained nearly 50 lbs. Not that thought it was a bad thing, just different. You needed to get new clothing and your life changed for the better. Since you still have the same girlfriend that you did in high school. She 'feeds' you all the time and you love it.
12.title: None stop buffets all summer.

choices: Calorie increaser. Double the calories in every bite!
Pound Packer. Gain 50 pounds for every sip.
13.content: After Robbert says all the options you decide to choose quick gain 'eating all that food is just very time consuming' you think. After Robbert finishes listing all the options he says "Please choose one and then go stand by the sign that has the option you would like to do written on it. You get up and walk to the sign that says Quick Gain on it. You wait there about five minutes and see that there are now about 30 Boys all crowded around the sign. "Hello boys, I'm Tyler and i'll be your councilor for the summer! Please follow me and we'll get started on the tour, and then we can get started with some fun!" He walks out of the hall and you all follow him. You notice that his cloths seems to be pretty tight on him, as if he put on a lot of weight in a very short amount of time. "First things first" says Tyler "Let me show you the Fat Lab as I like to call it." You say "Whats the Fat lab?" "Just wait and find out" says Tyler. You walk for about one minutes and you see a small building. Tyler opens the door and says "come on in." You all walk into the building. You look around and see lots of computers and very large shelf with lots of liquids and pills on it. Then tyler says "Feel free to look around and try everything out. If you have any questions don't be afraid to ask!" You all nod and a few people say "ok" and you all start looking around. You walk over to the shelf and look at the liquids sitting on it. You take a purple colored liquid and a glass bottle down and read the label, it says................

Tyler's got a cute belly. Time to flirt...
131.content:
The small glass vial with the purple liquid has a label which reads "Calorie Increaser: Double the Calories in Every Bite!". "Hmm, this looks good," you think to yourself. You bring the vial over to Tyler who was watching the campers explore and patting his stout belly. You notice Tyler's got quite the paunch, which works will with his muscular arms and cute blond hair. "Hey Tyler," you say. "How do I use this stuff?"

"Ah, the calorie increaser! Good choice. Like it says, you add a drop into whatever you drink with a meal and the meal with give you twice as many calories! That way you can gain the old fashioned ay but with more efficiency," Tyler said. "I used that stuff when I was a camper here."

Taking another look at Tyler's belly, you wonder if you can really get that big, and boy you hope you can. "Can I use it?" You ask eagerly.

Tyler responds "Sure, (IYNH)! All the stuff in here is at your disposal as long as you let the staff know what to take. But be careful, that stuff works exponentially. Two drops will quadruple the amount of calories and three drops with make eight times the amount! It can cause a nasty stomachache." And so with a grin on your face you slip the vial into your pocket. Then...

choices: Try to gain muscle and fat
Goto lunch and use the calorie doubler
1312.content:
Tyler responds "Sure, (IYNH)! All the stuff in here is at your disposal as long as you let the staff know what to take. But be careful, that stuff works exponentially. Two drops will quadruple the amount of calories and three drops with make eight times the amount! It can cause a nasty stomachache." And so with a grin on your face you slip the vial into your pocket.

Then you decide to talk to some of the other campers. You see a boy about your hight with blond hair and blue eyes. He is a little bulkier than you with a nice sized spare tire hanging over his shorts. You're pretty sure he hasn't always been that way and he just made himself like that. You wish he would have gotten bigger though.

You walk over to him and say "Hi I'm (IYNH)" The boy holds out a pudgy hand with fingers the size of sausages and says "Jeremy, my name is Jeremy. Nice to meet you." "You too." "So is this wight new or have you always been this big" you ask "Oh no, this is totally new, i used to be 120 pounds, but now i'm 250 lbs!" "wow, thats awesome! But you don't look like you're all fat, looks like you have some muscle under that" you say. "Yeah, I used the Pound Packer and combined it with some muscle. I like being huge, but not flabby, you know?" "Yeah I guess thats good. Why don't you get bigger now?" you ask. "Ok sure!" says Jeremy. He leads you to a shelf with some vials on it. You see one that reads Muscle Me. 50 pounds of muscle in every sip! Jeremy grabs the vial and take another vial out of his pocket, it reads Pound Packer. Gain 50 pounds in every sip! Then Jeremy grabs a cup and fills it with water. He puts 2 drops of the Muscle me in the cup. He mixes it for a second and then swallows it. For a second nothing happens, but then you realize his pecks and arms and legs are expanding. He looks like a body builder. Then we refills the cup with water and puts 3 drops of Pound Packer in it. He stirs it for a second then drinks it. After about a second, you notice his stomach is swelling along with his pecks and his arms and his legs. His neck has disappeared completely and he has 2 double chins. You look at his face which has gotten so pudgy, he's unrecognizable. His legs have gotten so big he has to walk in a kinda of waddle. His hands have gotten so chubby he can't really make a fist. His gut sticks right out along with his man breasts.

He looks at you and says "How do I look?" "Great!" you say. Then you think to yourself 'Why don't i try that myself?'
1312.title: You go talk to some other campers.

choices: "I see you've used the Fattening software. Looks good"
"Well, looks good but you need some more on you."
132.content: You walk over to the shelf and look at the liquids sitting on it. You take a purple colored liquid and a glass bottle down and read the label, it says Pound Packer! Gain 50 pounds for every sip. 'Oh, boy!' you think 'I gotta try this!' Next to the shelf you see a small table with a plastic cup dispenser. You take a cup and pour some of the liquid into the cup. You take a small sip, it tastes like cherries. You swallow and look down at your stomach. You pull up your shirt to see that your abs are slowly melting away being replaced by soft fat. You smile and put your hand on your stomach and feel it expanding outwards. You look up to see Tyler he says "I see you've tried the Pound Packer, thats a good one. He grabs a cup and fills it with some and downs it. You look at him and see his stomach slowly starting to expand, he says "hey, if you want, i can show you how to use the Body Design software." "Sure" you say. he leads you over to the computers and says "Stand in that glass box so the computer can scan you." "Ok" you say. As you walk over to the box, you notice your stomach bounces a little bit with each step. You go and stand in the glass box. After about 5 seconds Tyler says "Ok come here and let me show you how this works" you walk back over to him and pull up a chair next to him at one of the computers. A program is open running a 3d model of your body. Tyler shows you how you can sculpt your body and make it look the way you want. "But what is the point of this?" you ask. "Once you make your model the way you want. You can then apply it to yourself." says Tyler "COOL!" you say. "Ok you work on that, i have to go help some of the other campers." He walks away, you notice he's a little bigger then he was before. You look back at the computer and start editing the model. You make your self much beefier, with wider shoulders and a thick neck. You also add a large gut and butt. You decide to put some muscle under it so you can carry the weight without trouble. When your done with the model, you click on the button that says apply. When you press the button a warning message says 'Please go stand in the scanner.' You walk over and stand in the scanner. As soon as you get in, a red light starts to run up and down your body. You look down and see that after every round it makes going back a forth, you seem to be a bit bigger. Once it done you step out, noticing that your stomach seems to sway with every step, and your cloths are making ripping noises. You see a shelf with shirts and pants folded on it and a sign that says one size fits all. You waddle over to the shelf and grab some pants and a shirt. Then you walk over to a door marked Restroom. You go inside and waddle over o the mirror. You look at your self in the mirror and its very hard to recognize yourself. Your face is a lot bigger, and you have hardly any neck. Your shoulders and chest are huge. Looking down you see a large gut protruding from under your much to small T-shirt. You look down at your fingers and find that there now the size of sausages. You quickly take off your shirt finding its much more difficult to do. You Put on the new shirt. Its snug but is stretchy, like elastic. The pants are the same way. You pick up your shirt from the floor noticing its a bit of a struggle to bend down. You walk out of the bathroom and see Tyler and he says..............
132.title: Pound Packer. Gain 50 pounds for every sip.

choices: "Introduce you to some of the other campers"
"Show you what it's like to be REALLY big. It's fun!"
1321.content:
"I see you've used the Fattening Software. Looks good," Tyler says, giving your new belly a nice pat. It wobbles about in a way you are not used to and you find it very enjoyable. In fact, you just then notice that you've been rubbing your belly since you got it. You have to agree with Tyler that your belly, as well as the rest of you, looks good. Then again, it is exactly what you wanted for yourself. In fact, your corpulent body looks even better against the tight, stretchy fabric. Tyler on the other hand left his belly to struggle against his beige camp uniform.

"Thanks!" You say. "Your belly looks great too!" As if on queue, one of the buttons on Tyler's uniform pops off, bouncing against your stomach and landing between you too. You and Tyler both laugh at it, bellies bouncing like bowls of jelly. "That's so cool! Yeah, the uniform's busted but how come you didn't grow that belly earlier?"

"Don't worry about that, it happens all the time here. And all the staff here start out the summer thin. We fatten alongside the campers both to encourage and show our legitimacy. We have some weight loss stuff so you can gain over and over again. Some kids like gaining but don't want to be past a certain weight so we keep the stuff around. Besides, unfortunately some kids can't go home fat." Tyler says, with a bit of resentment at the last part. "By the end of the summer I'm usually much bigger than this!"

"I can't wait to see that," You say. And it's true. Watching Tyler's belly expand was very... nice. And you'd very much like to see it grow more.

"Say, why don't you come with me," Tyler says. "I can..."

"Well, looks good but you need some more on you."

How much more weight?
